mapper.insert: INSERT INTO participation (challenge_id, user_id, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{challengeId}, #{userId}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.challenge_id, p.user_id, p.status, p.submission_url, p.submitted_at, p.order_id, m.nickname, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM participation p LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = p.user_id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.id, p.challenge_id, p.user_id, p.status, p.submission_url, p.submitted_at, p.order_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM participation p WHERE p.id = #{id} FOR UPDATE

SELECT p.id, p.challenge_id, p.user_id, p.status, p.submission_url, p.submitted_at, p.order_id, m.nickname, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM participation p LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = p.user_id WHERE p.challenge_id = #{challengeId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT p.id, p.challenge_id, p.user_id, p.status, p.submission_url, p.submitted_at, p.order_id, m.nickname, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM participation p LEFT JOIN member m ON m.id = p.user_id ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE participation SET submission_url = #{submissionUrl}, submitted_at = NOW(), status = 'SUBMITTED', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
